Control Name: 1.9.2 Data is organized into access tiers.
Control Statement: You can reduce cost by placing blob data into the most cost-effective access tier. Place frequently accessed data in hot tier, less frequent in cold or archive tier. Use Premium storage for workloads with high transaction volumes or ones where latency is critical.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 1.9 How do you manage storage and data costs for this workload?
